tools.title: Power BI Service (District)
tools.desc: District-wide Power BI workspace with governed semantic models connected to EDX publish views.

connection.auth: Azure AD SSO; service principal for refresh
connection.policy: Row filters by org/term; PII masked per Effective Policy
connection.notes: Use the certified datasets in the 'EDX – Certified' workspace for production use.
steps: Click the SSO link and sign in with district credentials.
Verify your role is applied (masking visible on PII).
Pin reports to your personal or team workspace.

tools.title: Tableau Cloud (Institution)
tools.desc: Curated dashboards for enrollment, grades, and attendance with data sourced from EDX publish views.

connection.auth: SAML SSO; PAT for extract refresh if required
connection.policy: ABAC scopes enforced on server; masking applied to restricted columns
connection.notes: Prefer live connections with row-level security; extracts need Steward approval.
steps: Use 'New → Workbook' and connect to Snowflake (OAuth).

connection.notes: Access is read-only; exports require additional approval.
steps: Use the SSO link with district credentials.
Select reporting year and confirm district scope.

tools.title: Looker (HE Analytics)
tools.desc: Higher-Ed semantic models for enrollment and outcomes.

connection.auth: Google IdP SSO; service account for PDTs
connection.notes: Use approved Explores only; PDT builds run under governed SA.
steps: Create Looks with governed Explores; save to Shared folder.

connection.auth: SAML SSO; API token for CI
connection.policy: Read-only in publish; no write access
connection.notes: Use Explorer for lineage; job runs restricted by environment.
steps: Use 'Explore' to view lineage from dataset to report.
